name: playwright_template
description: Playwright demo project to be used as template

scripts.docker:kill: docker stop playwrightDemo && docker rm playwrightDemo
scripts.docker:run_local: docker exec playwrightDemo npx playwright test -c src/config/local.config.ts
scripts.docker:run_stage: docker exec playwrightDemo npx playwright test -c src/config/stage.config.ts
scripts.docker:run_prod: docker exec playwrightDemo npx playwright test -c src/config/prod.config.ts
scripts.allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean  && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.clean: rm -rf allure-report && rm -rf allure-results && rm -rf test-results && rm -rf playwright-report && rm -rf dist
scripts.update:
npm install @playwright/test@latest && npx playwright install && echo '----------
UPDATE THE DOCKER FILE WITH NEW VERSION:' && npx @playwright/test --version && echo ----------
